projects.title: ProClip
projects.description: A clipboard manager that helps users to manage their clipboard data(text and images). It ensures that all copied information is securely stored for a period ranging from 30 to 90 days. This feature guarantees that users can access their clipboard history even after restarting their devices.ProClip offers a user-friendly interface with a chronological order of stored data, making it easy to track and retrieve past entries. Additionally, the integrated search bar allows users to quickly find specific items within their clipboard history, enhancing productivity and efficiency

projects.title: Wavelet Trees
projects.description: Wavelet trees are used to separate sound frequencies by decomposing a signal into different frequency bands through a series of filters and decimation. Each node in the tree represents a specific frequency range, with low-frequency components typically on the lower branches and high-frequency components on the upper branches. This process allows for a detailed analysis of the signal's frequency content and its temporal location. We worked on parallelization of the whole process by distributing the subtree process to worker threads and applying optimal compression logic to solve the problem in optimal space and time.
